item.title: Department of Energy cancels $7.5B of clean energy projects in mostly blue states

item.title: OpenAI’s Sora soars to No. 3 on the US App Store
item.description: Sora becomes the No. 3 US app after 164K downloads in 2 days, making the AI video app an early hit.

item.title: YouTubers aren’t relying on ad revenue anymore — here’s how some are diversifying
item.description: YouTubers are no longer just creators, and in some cases, their side businesses are growing faster than their channels.

item.title: Google’s Jules enters developers’ toolchains as AI coding agent competition heats up
item.description: Jules is already being used by developers to complete code after experimenting on vibe-coding platforms.
